com.carJee.facade

Class AbstractFacade<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carJee.facade.AbstractFacade<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the entity
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FacadeLocal<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorFacade, BookFacade, ClientFacade, CommandFacade

    public abstract class AbstractFacade<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements FacadeLocal<T>
    Is an implementation of facade for a generic type. This class is meant to be ectended and the type T should be replaced by the type that the extended facade support
